sentences.en: A surcharge is levied on late applications.
sentences.cn: 迟交的申请要收取附加费.

sentences.en: A surcharge of 40 francs was added to our bill.
sentences.cn: 我们的账单上加了40法郎的附加费.

sentences.en: A surcharge will be levied for any repositioning of exhibits.
sentences.cn: 如需重新就位展品,将收取额外费用.

sentences.en: Allrate are subject to 15 % surcharge and breakfast ( 1 or 2 ) daily.
sentences.cn: 以上房价包含15%服务费和1或2份自早餐.

sentences.en: Depart at Sunday, Surcharge fee pls call hotline for enquiry.
sentences.cn: 逢星期日出发, 现在价格可能会有附加费,请致电热线查询!

sentences.en: Examples of calculation of the contribution surcharge are enclosed for your reference.
sentences.cn: 随函附上计算供款附加费的例子,以兹说明.

sentences.en: Exclude All airport tax, security tax, fuel surcharge and insurance surcharge.
sentences.cn: 价格不包括机场税, 保安税, 燃油附加费和保险费.

sentences.en: For special packaging requirements, the need to raise the surcharge gum.
sentences.cn: 如有特殊包装要求, 需加收2%-5%的附加费.

sentences.en: Fuel surcharge, airport & local departure taxes are not included.
sentences.cn: 以上价格不包括燃油附加费 、 香港 及 当地离境税.

sentences.en: No person shall prior to leaving the paid area fail or refuse to pay any fare surcharge or other sum leviable in accordance with these by-laws .
sentences.cn: 任何人不得在未付或拒付按照本附例可征收的任何车费、附加费或其它款项情况下离开已付车费区域。

sentences.en: Please notice that the bunker surcharge will be down regulated to 10.75.
sentences.cn: 下个月燃油附加费将下调到10.75,请知悉!

sentences.en: Prices exclude HK airport security charge , both side airport taxes, fuel surcharge.
sentences.cn: 以上价格不包括香港及北京机场税、香港机场保安税 、 燃油附加费.

sentences.en: The above rates are net are inclusive of 15 % surcharge.
sentences.cn: 所有房价均为净价,不需加收15%服务费.

sentences.en: The government introduced a 15% surcharge on imports.
sentences.cn: 政府推出了15%的进口附加费。

sentences.en: There is a surcharge for excess baggage.
sentences.cn: 行李超重要交一定的附加费.

sentences.en: There will be no overdue payment, hence no surcharge.
sentences.cn: 付款永不过期, 因此毋须担心被加徵附加费.

sentences.en: We have slashed the National Insurance Surcharge.
sentences.cn: 我们削减了国民保险额外费.

phrases.tran_cn: 燃油附加费；燃油费；燃油特别付加运赁

trans.tran_cn: 附加费，额外费用，超载，[法]过高收费行为，加盖过的邮票（或印花税票）
trans.tran_en: money that you have to pay in addition to the basic price of something

trans.tran_cn: 追加罚款；使…装载过多；使…负担过重
trans.tran_en: to make someone pay an additional amount of money

trans.tran_cn: 追加罚款，使…装载过多，使…负担过重，索高价
trans.tran_en: to make someone pay an additional amount of money
